se.aphelion.assignment.ordermatcher

Class Broker

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.aphelion.assignment.ordermatcher.Broker

  • public class Broker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the main business logic or trading rules.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Broker(OrderBook orderBook)
      Class constructor of OrderBook used for trading.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkRoles(Order order, Order bestOrder)
      Check the order with the best offer from orderBook if rules are matched trades that else add order to the orderBook.
      void printTrade(int volume, int price)
      Prints the trade to standard output.
      void processOrder(Order order)
      Process an order by adding that to the orderBook or sending that for trading rules checking.
      void trade(Order order, Order bestOrder)
      Does the actual trade depending on the volume of order and the best order.

        public void trade(Order order,
         Order bestOrder)
        Does the actual trade depending on the volume of order and the best order. It depends on the difference of volume that is performed in different actions.
